body:
looks like you tried this when I was in the process of refreshing the package on packages.microsoft.com.

The package is fine now.
```


rpm -qpi powershell-6.0.0_alpha.17-1.el7.centos.x86_64.rpm  Name        : powershell
Version     : 6.0.0_alpha.17
Release     : 1.el7.centos
Architecture: x86_64
Install Date: (not installed)
Group       : shells
Size        : 143031860
License     : MIT License
Signature   : RSA/SHA256, Thu 09 Mar 2017 04:09:53 PM EST, Key ID eb3e94adbe1229cf
Source RPM  : powershell-6.0.0_alpha.17-1.el7.centos.src.rpm
Build Date  : Thu 09 Mar 2017 03:25:48 PM EST
Build Host  : 729de4de67fe
Relocations : /
Packager    : PowerShell Team <PowerShellTeam@hotmail.com>
Vendor      : Microsoft Corporation
URL         : https://microsoft.com/powershell
Summary     : PowerShell is an automation and configuration management platform.
Description :
PowerShell is an automation and configuration management platform.
It consists of a cross-platform command-line shell and associated scripting language.
```
